verses.verse: תִּמְשֹׁ֣ךְ <S%H4900><s%> Canst thou draw out לִוְיָתָ֣ן <S%H3882><s%> leviathan בְּחַכָּ֑ה <S%H2443><s%> angle וּ֝בְחֶ֗בֶל <S%H2256><s%> with a cord תַּשְׁקִ֥יעַ <S%H8257><s%> [which] thou lettest down לְשֹׁנֽוֹ׃ <S%H3956><s%> his tongue

הֲתָשִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> Canst thou put אַגְמ֣וֹן <S%H100><s%> an hook בְּאַפּ֑וֹ <S%H639><s%> his nose וּ֝בְח֗וֹחַ <S%H2336><s%> bramble תִּקּ֥וֹב <S%H5344><s%> pierce לֶֽחֱיוֹ׃ <S%H3895><s%> his jaw

הֲיַרְבֶּ֣ה <S%H7235><s%> Will he make many אֵ֭לֶיךָ <S%H413><s%> about תַּחֲנוּנִ֑ים <S%H8469><s%> supplications אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or יְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> unto thee? will he speak אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you רַכּֽוֹת׃ <S%H7390><s%> soft

הֲיִכְרֹ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> Will he make בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> will you תִּ֝קָּחֶ֗נּוּ <S%H3947><s%> with thee? wilt thou take לְעֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> him for a servant עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> alway
הַֽתְשַׂחֶק־ <S%H7832><s%> Wilt thou play בּ֭וֹ כַּצִּפּ֑וֹר <S%H6833><s%> A bird וְ֝תִקְשְׁרֶ֗נּוּ <S%H7194><s%> bind לְנַעֲרוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5291><s%> damsel

יִכְר֣וּ <S%H3738><s%> dig עָ֭לָיו <S%H5921><s%> over חַבָּרִ֑ים <S%H2271><s%> Shall the companions יֶ֝חֱצ֗וּהוּ <S%H2673><s%> of him? shall they part בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> among כְּֽנַעֲנִֽים׃ <S%H3669><s%> Canaanite

הַֽתְמַלֵּ֣א <S%H4390><s%> Canst thou fill בְשֻׂכּ֣וֹת <S%H7905><s%> harpoons עוֹר֑וֹ <S%H5785><s%> his skin וּבְצִלְצַ֖ל <S%H6767><s%> cymbal דָּגִ֣ים <S%H1709><s%> with fish רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H7218><s%> his head

שִׂים־ <S%H7760><s%> Lay עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> and כַּפֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3709><s%> thine hand זְכֹ֥ר <S%H2142><s%> upon him remember מִ֝לְחָמָ֗ה <S%H4421><s%> the battle אַל־ <S%H408><s%> shall not תּוֹסַֽף׃ <S%H3254><s%> do no more

הֵן־ <S%H2005><s%> Behold תֹּחַלְתּ֥וֹ <S%H8431><s%> Behold the hope נִכְזָ֑בָה <S%H3576><s%> of him is in vain הֲגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> even אֶל־ <S%H408><s%> nay מַרְאָ֣יו <S%H4758><s%> even at the sight יֻטָֽל׃ <S%H2904><s%> shall not [one] be cast down

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> No אַ֭כְזָר <S%H393><s%> None [is so] fierce כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> dares יְעוּרֶ֑נּוּ <S%H5782><s%> to arouse וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who ה֝֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לְפָנַ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יִתְיַצָּֽב׃ <S%H3320><s%> who then is able to stand

מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who הִ֭קְדִּימַנִי <S%H6923><s%> Who hath prevented וַאֲשַׁלֵּ֑ם <S%H7999><s%> me that I should repay תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> [him? whatsoever is] under the whole heaven לִי־ הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

[לֹא־ כ] (לֹֽו־ <S%H3808><s%> I will not אַחֲרִ֥ישׁ <S%H2790><s%> I will not conceal ק) בַּדָּ֑יו <S%H905><s%> his limbs וּדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> act גְּ֝בוּר֗וֹת <S%H1369><s%> his mighty וְחִ֣ין <S%H2433><s%> nor his comely עֶרְכּֽוֹ׃ <S%H6187><s%> proportion

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who גִ֭לָּה <S%H1540><s%> Who can discover פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> the face לְבוּשׁ֑וֹ <S%H3830><s%> apparel בְּכֶ֥פֶל <S%H3718><s%> [to him] with his double רִ֝סְנ֗וֹ <S%H7448><s%> bridle מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who יָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> come

דַּלְתֵ֣י <S%H1817><s%> the doors פָ֭נָיו <S%H6440><s%> accept מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who פִתֵּ֑חַ <S%H6605><s%> Who can open סְבִיב֖וֹת <S%H5439><s%> round about שִׁנָּ֣יו <S%H8127><s%> his teeth אֵימָֽה׃ <S%H367><s%> [are] terrible

גַּ֭אֲוָה <S%H1346><s%> [are his] pride אֲפִיקֵ֣י <S%H650><s%> brook מָֽגִנִּ֑ים <S%H4043><s%> scales סָ֝ג֗וּר <S%H5462><s%> shut up together חוֹתָ֥ם <S%H2368><s%> seal צָֽר׃ <S%H6862><s%> [as with] a close

אֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> One בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> to another יִגַּ֑שׁוּ <S%H5066><s%> is so near וְ֝ר֗וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> that no air לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> can come בֵֽינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H996><s%> between

אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> one בְּאָחִ֥יהוּ <S%H251><s%> to another יְדֻבָּ֑קוּ <S%H1692><s%> They are joined יִ֝תְלַכְּד֗וּ <S%H3920><s%> they stick together וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and cannot יִתְפָּרָֽדוּ׃ <S%H6504><s%> that they cannot be sundered

עֲ‍ֽ֭טִישֹׁתָיו <S%H5846><s%> By his neesings תָּ֣הֶל <S%H1984><s%> doth shine א֑וֹר <S%H216><s%> a light וְ֝עֵינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> and his eyes כְּעַפְעַפֵּי־ <S%H6079><s%> [are] like the eyelids שָֽׁחַר׃ <S%H7837><s%> of the morning

מִ֭פִּיו <S%H6310><s%> Out of his mouth לַפִּידִ֣ים <S%H3940><s%> burning lamps יַהֲלֹ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> go כִּיד֥וֹדֵי <S%H3590><s%> [and] sparks אֵ֝֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire יִתְמַלָּֽטוּ׃ <S%H4422><s%> leap out

מִ֭נְּחִירָיו <S%H5156><s%> Out of his nostrils יֵצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> goeth עָשָׁ֑ן <S%H6227><s%> smoke כְּד֖וּד <S%H1731><s%> pot נָפ֣וּחַ <S%H5301><s%> as [out] of a seething וְאַגְמֹֽן׃ <S%H100><s%> or caldron

נַ֭פְשׁוֹ <S%H5315><s%> His breath גֶּחָלִ֣ים <S%H1513><s%> coals תְּלַהֵ֑ט <S%H3857><s%> kindleth וְ֝לַ֗הַב <S%H3851><s%> and a flame מִפִּ֥יו <S%H6310><s%> of his mouth יֵצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> goeth out

בְּֽ֭צַוָּארוֹ <S%H6677><s%> In his neck יָלִ֣ין <S%H3885><s%> remaineth עֹ֑ז <S%H5797><s%> strength וּ֝לְפָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> before תָּד֥וּץ <S%H1750><s%> is turned into joy דְּאָבָֽה׃ <S%H1670><s%> and sorrow

מַפְּלֵ֣י <S%H4651><s%> The flakes בְשָׂר֣וֹ <S%H1320><s%> of his flesh דָבֵ֑קוּ <S%H1692><s%> are joined together יָצ֥וּק <S%H3332><s%> they are firm עָ֝לָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> and בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest יִמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4131><s%> in themselves they cannot be moved

לִ֭בּוֹ <S%H3820><s%> His heart יָצ֣וּק <S%H3332><s%> is as firm כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> as אָ֑בֶן <S%H68><s%> as a stone וְ֝יָצ֗וּק <S%H3332><s%> yea as hard כְּפֶ֣לַח <S%H6400><s%> as a piece תַּחְתִּֽית׃ <S%H8482><s%> of the nether

מִ֭שֵּׂתוֹ <S%H7613><s%> When he raiseth up יָג֣וּרוּ <S%H1481><s%> are afraid אֵלִ֑ים <S%H410><s%> the mighty מִ֝שְּׁבָרִ֗ים <S%H7667><s%> by reason of breakings יִתְחַטָּֽאוּ׃ <S%H2398><s%> they purify

מַשִּׂיגֵ֣הוּ <S%H5381><s%> of him that layeth חֶ֭רֶב <S%H2719><s%> The sword בְּלִ֣י <S%H1097><s%> cannot תָק֑וּם <S%H6965><s%> at him cannot hold חֲנִ֖ית <S%H2595><s%> the spear מַסָּ֣ע <S%H4551><s%> the dart וְשִׁרְיָֽה׃ <S%H8302><s%> nor the habergeon
יַחְשֹׁ֣ב <S%H2803><s%> He esteemeth לְתֶ֣בֶן <S%H8401><s%> as straw בַּרְזֶ֑ל <S%H1270><s%> iron לְעֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> wood רִקָּב֣וֹן <S%H7539><s%> as rotten נְחוּשָֽׁה׃ <S%H5154><s%> [and] brass

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יַבְרִיחֶ֥נּוּ <S%H1272><s%> cannot make him flee בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the arrow קָ֑שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> arch לְ֝קַ֗שׁ <S%H7179><s%> with him into stubble נֶהְפְּכוּ־ <S%H2015><s%> are turned ל֥וֹ אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> stones קָֽלַע׃ <S%H7050><s%> hanging

כְּ֭קַשׁ <S%H7179><s%> as stubble נֶחְשְׁב֣וּ <S%H2803><s%> are counted תוֹתָ֑ח <S%H8455><s%> Darts וְ֝יִשְׂחַ֗ק <S%H7832><s%> he laugheth לְרַ֣עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> at the shaking כִּידֽוֹן׃ <S%H3591><s%> of a spear

תַּ֭חְתָּיו <S%H8478><s%> his underparts חַדּ֣וּדֵי <S%H2303><s%> Sharp חָ֑רֶשׂ <S%H2789><s%> stones יִרְפַּ֖ד <S%H7502><s%> [are] under him he spreadeth חָר֣וּץ <S%H2742><s%> sharp pointed things עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> on טִֽיט׃ <S%H2916><s%> upon the mire

יַרְתִּ֣יחַ <S%H7570><s%> to boil כַּסִּ֣יר <S%H5518><s%> like a pot מְצוּלָ֑ה <S%H4688><s%> He maketh the deep יָ֝֗ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea יָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> he maketh כַּמֶּרְקָחָֽה׃ <S%H4841><s%> like a pot of ointment

אַ֭חֲרָיו <S%H310><s%> after יָאִ֣יר <S%H215><s%> to shine נָתִ֑יב <S%H5410><s%> He maketh a path יַחְשֹׁ֖ב <S%H2803><s%> him [one] would think תְּה֣וֹם <S%H8415><s%> the deep לְשֵׂיבָֽה׃ <S%H7872><s%> [to be] hoary אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> else עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on

עָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> Upon earth מָשְׁל֑וֹ <S%H4915><s%> there is not his like הֶ֝עָשׂ֗וּ <S%H6213><s%> who is made לִבְלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> without חָֽת׃ <S%H2844><s%> fear אֵֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> that

גָּבֹ֥הַּ <S%H1364><s%> all high יִרְאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> He beholdeth ה֝֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> He מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [things] he [is] a king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> over all the children שָֽׁחַץ׃ <S%H7830><s%> of pride ס
